E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 6/5/1993
Subject: I am a starter...
... so would you please put me in the rotation?
I want to go out there and start for my
team. Please come on, manager!

Regards,
Cliff Speck



Date: Monday, 6/9/1993
Subject: Progress of Ken Ryan
Dear Sir,
Ken Ryan is doing pretty good at A Palm Springs Angels!
He has an ERA of 2.14, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 6/15/1993
Subject: Progress of Tim Scott
Dear Sir,
Tim Scott has nothing more to prove at AA Midland Angels!
He has an ERA of 2.42 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
